headerText.comment: The text to use in the header area

nodeOnlineTextColor.comment: The text color to use for labeling an online node
ringColor.comment: The color to render the ring

rings.id.comment: A unique identifier for the ring to be used in logging and constructing image files
rings.nodes.comment: The list of nodes that are participants in this ring, in order
